thread.title: Segue Resources substantial shareholder increase stake to 12.52%
thread.title_full: Segue Resources substantial shareholder increase stake to 12.52% | MENAFN.COM

author: ProactiveInvestors  Australia
title: Segue Resources substantial shareholder increase stake to 12.52%
text:
(MENAFN - ProactiveInvestors) Segue Resources ( ASX:SEG ) substantial shareholder; N&J Mitchell Holdings Pty Ltd Croesus Mining Pty Ltd and Linda Steinepreis; has increased its stake in the company to 12.52% from 12.13%.

This is due to participation in the recent placement priced at 0.003 to raise 5 .

Collectively 1 worth of shares was acquired increasing the total holding up to 2818 shares.

The company is seeking a further 2 million through a Share Purchase Plan.

Proceeds will be used to fund exploration and drilling at its Plumridge Nickel Project in the Fraser Range Province Western Australia.

The initial focus of its reverse circulation program is on the northern cluster of targets.

Adding interest - several high priority targets will be drill-tested to confirm the presence of mafic-ultramafic intrusions commencing with targets E1 and E15.


Proactive Investors Australia is the market leader in producing news articles and research reports on ASX emerging companies with distribution in Australia UK North America and Hong Kong / China.
